titles.title: I See A Church Without Spot Or Wrinkle

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I see a Church without spot or wrinkle.
I see a manchild, coming on the earth.
If you keep your vision sure, if you keep your heart pure,
Then you'll see the woman, bringing forth the Son.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I see a woman, clothed with the sun.
And the moon is under her feet.
If you keep your vision sure, if you keep your heart pure,
Then you'll see the woman, bringing forth the Son.
